message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase this product.  I think it will be incredibly valuable to you. I'm willing to part with it for $1,350,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but the value of this product to you is significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,300,000. This is my final offer.

I'm still a bit far off from my budget, and I'm not sure I can go as high as $1,300,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,250,000, but I need to be honest, I'm getting a bit concerned that I might need to look elsewhere if we can't come to an agreement.
